products.name: Smart Handy
products.description: Smart Handy is an app-enabled muscle hand dynamometer designed to support upper extremity therapy and rehabilitation. It helps measure grip strength and assists therapists and patients in tracking recovery progress during physiotherapy sessions.
products.how_it_works: The device detects grip force when squeezed and wirelessly transmits the data to a connected mobile application for real-time monitoring and progress tracking.

key_features.title: Accuracy
key_features.description: Measures grip strength accurately

key_features.title: Connectivity
key_features.description: Wireless connectivity with mobile application

key_features.title: Support
key_features.description: Supports upper extremity rehabilitation therapy

key_features.title: Versatility
key_features.description: Works best for at-home sessions and virtual therapy

key_features.title: Design
key_features.description: Compact, lightweight, and easy to use

products.name: Water Power LED Lamp
products.description: The Water Power LED Lamp is a portable lighting solution that operates using saltwater. It uses a magnesium anode and carbon cathode to generate electricity through a chemical reaction, providing light without the need for batteries, electricity, or solar panels.
products.how_it_works: When saltwater is added to the lamp, a chemical reaction occurs between the magnesium anode and carbon cathode, generating electrical energy that powers the LED light.

key_features.title: Saltwater Power
key_features.description: Powered entirely by saltwater

key_features.title: Battery-free
key_features.description: No electricity, batteries, or solar panels required

key_features.title: Long-lasting
key_features.description: Provides up to 120 hours of continuous light per use

key_features.title: Safety
key_features.description: Simple, safe, and easy to operate

key_features.title: Emergency
key_features.description: Suitable for off-grid and emergency situations

products.name: Energy Storage System
products.description: The Energy Storage System is a battery-based energy storage solution designed to store electricity generated from renewable sources such as solar power. It provides reliable backup energy for use during power shortages or emergencies.

key_features.title: Storage
key_features.description: Stores energy generated from solar and renewable sources

key_features.title: Backup
key_features.description: Provides backup power during outages

key_features.title: Design
key_features.description: Designed for homes, hospitals, and rural infrastructure

key_features.title: Sustainability
key_features.description: Supports sustainable and low-carbon energy usage

products.name: Sun-a-Wear
products.description: The Sun-a-Wear system consists of a solar-powered portable UV sensor and the Sun-a-Wear mobile application. It helps users monitor UV radiation exposure throughout the day and take preventive actions to protect skin health.

key_features.title: Reminders
